New Records: South Africa leads the overall head-to-head record in ODI matches with 50 wins in 90 games; India has 37 wins in 90 matches against South Africa; South Africa has the most wickets in the World Cup with 67 at the time of writing; India's highest wicket-taker in ODIs is Anil Kumble with 46 wickets; South Africa's highest wicket-taker is Shaun Pollock with 48 wickets; Sachin Tendulkar is India's highest run-scorer in ODIs with 2001 runs; Jacques Kallis is South Africa's highest run-scorer with 1535 runs
Key Match Events: The match is a crucial contest for India's title credentials; Virat Kohli's birthday celebration with 70,000 fans wearing his face masks; Rohit Sharma's connection with Kolkata; the teams have a rich history with India leading 17 out of 31 matches on home soil and 2 out of 3 ODIs at Eden Gardens
Squads: India's squad includes Rohit Sharma (captain), Hardik Pandya, Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul (vice-captain and wicket-keeper), Ravindra Jadeja, Shardul Thakur, Jasprit Bumrah, Mohammed Siraj, Kuldeep Yadav, Mohammed Shami, Ravichandran Ashwin, Ishan Kishan, Suryakumar Yadav, Prasidh Krishna; South Africa's squad includes Temba Bavuma (captain), Gerald Coetzee, Quinton de Kock (wicket-keeper), Reeza Hendricks, Marco Jansen, Heinrich Klaasen (wicket-keeper), Keshav Maharaj, Aiden Markram, David Miller, Lungi Ngidi, Andile Phehlukwayo, Kagiso Rabada, Tabraiz Shamsi, Rassie van der Dussen, Lizaad Williams
Milestones or Significant Achievements: India has not won the ICC Cricket World Cup since 2013; the match is a significant one for both teams in the World Cup
Pre-Game Insights: The match is a test of India's title credentials; South Africa has five 300-plus team totals in the World Cup; India has seven consecutive wins leading up to the match; the head-to-head narrative is a subjective motivation for both teams
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the Battle of the Behemoths; a clash of table-toppers; a contest of skill sets; the match is a pivotal game in the World Cup; India's journey to the semis is on the line
Others: The match is expected to have high energy and support from fans; the teams are well-prepared for the contest
